at.TimoCraft.TimoCloud.api

Interface TimoCloudBukkitAPI


  • public interface TimoCloudBukkitAPI
    Use TimoCloudAPI.getBukkitInstance() to get an instance of this class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCurrentPlayers(java.lang.String server)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getCurrentPlayers() to get the servers current player count
      java.lang.String getExtra()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.getExtra() to get the extra

      Deprecated.

      Deprecated. 
      Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.getMap() to get the map
      java.lang.String getMapName(java.lang.String server)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getMap() to get the servers map
      int getMaxPlayers(java.lang.String server)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getMaxPlayers() to get the servers maximal player count
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOnlineServersByGroup(java.lang.String group)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance(), get the wanted group by TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getGroup(String) and get the servers by GroupObject.getServers() Returns a list of server names registered in BungeeCord by TimoCloud. For example, you can use it to send a player to a random lobby server: Attention! When calling the first time, the method will return an empty list and will only add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method once you enable your plugin!
      java.lang.String getServerName() 
      java.lang.String getState()
      Deprecated. 
      Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.getState() to get the state
      java.lang.String getState(java.lang.String server)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getState() to get the servers state
      ServerObject getThisServer() 
      boolean isRandomMap()
      Deprecated. 
      You don't need to know if the map has been chosen randomly
      void sendCommandToBungeeCord(java.lang.String command)
      The given command will be executed on BungeeCord
      void sendPlayerToRandomServerOfGroup(Player player, java.lang.String group)
      Deprecated. 
      Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance(), get the wanted group by using TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getGroup(String), get the servers by GroupObject.getServers(), get a random server from the list, use ServerObject.getName() to get its name and send to player to the server as shown here: https://goo.gl/rMvKwE Sends a player to a random server of a given group. Attention! This calls the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group), so you have to be aware of the same thing as mentioned above: Calling the method the first time will not have any affect, just to add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group) when loading your plugin.
      void setExtra(java.lang.String extra)
      Deprecated. 
      Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.setExtra(String) to set the extra
      void setState(java.lang.String state)
      Deprecated. 
      Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.setState(String) to set the state

      • setState

        @Deprecated
void setState(java.lang.String state)
        Deprecated. Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.setState(String) to set the state
        Will be sent to TimoCloud BungeeCord
        Parameters:
        state - Any string, e.g. "ONLINE", "INGAME", "RESTARTING"

      • isRandomMap

        @Deprecated
boolean isRandomMap()
        Deprecated. You don't need to know if the map has been chosen randomly
        If a server uses a random map
        Returns:
        If server map has been chosen randomly

      • getMapName

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getMapName()
        Deprecated. Use getThisServer() to get the ServerObject and use ServerObject.getMap() to get the map
        Returns:
        If map was randomly chosen, this will return the map name, if you call the template "YOURGROUP_VILLAGE", it will return VILLAGE. If you don't have multiple maps, it will return the defaultMapName set in config

        Parameters:

      • getState

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getState(java.lang.String server)
        Deprecated. Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getState() to get the servers state
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers state - if not found, it will return OFFLINE

        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers (randomly chosen?) map name

      • getExtra

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String getExtra(java.lang.String server)
        Deprecated. Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getExtra() to get the servers extra
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers Extra - if not found, it will return an empty String ("")

      • getCurrentPlayers

        @Deprecated
int getCurrentPlayers(java.lang.String server)
        Deprecated. Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance() to get the TimoCloudUniversalAPI, use TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getServer(String) to get wanted server and use ServerObject.getCurrentPlayers() to get the servers current player count
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers state - if not found, it will return 0

      • getMaxPlayers

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The servers state - if not found, it will return 0

      • getOnlineServersByGroup

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOnlineServersByGroup(java.lang.String group)
        Deprecated. Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance(), get the wanted group by TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getGroup(String) and get the servers by GroupObject.getServers() Returns a list of server names registered in BungeeCord by TimoCloud. For example, you can use it to send a player to a random lobby server: Attention! When calling the first time, the method will return an empty list and will only add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method once you enable your plugin!
        Parameters:
        group - The server group (e.g. "Lobby")
        Returns:
        List of connected servers in this group

      • sendPlayerToRandomServerOfGroup

        @Deprecated
void sendPlayerToRandomServerOfGroup(Player player,
                                                 java.lang.String group)
        Deprecated. Use TimoCloudAPI.getUniversalInstance(), get the wanted group by using TimoCloudUniversalAPI.getGroup(String), get the servers by GroupObject.getServers(), get a random server from the list, use ServerObject.getName() to get its name and send to player to the server as shown here: https://goo.gl/rMvKwE Sends a player to a random server of a given group. Attention! This calls the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group), so you have to be aware of the same thing as mentioned above: Calling the method the first time will not have any affect, just to add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group) when loading your plugin.
        Parameters:
        player - Player you want to send
        group - Group you want to randomly choose a server

      • sendCommandToBungeeCord

        void sendCommandToBungeeCord(java.lang.String command)
        The given command will be executed on BungeeCord
        Parameters:
        command - Without leading '/'
